Articles.Content: Alemagno realizes that him taking all hills was just a mere fantasy he had in his mind, while an [Ori warship makes an orbital strike](http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100829015546/stargate/images/a/a2/Dakaraweapondestrucion.jpg) on your forcefield (Sun's), destroying it and the entire hill.
satill them eeagaverzse

megatiger78 does something completely ununderstandable (basically nothing). The Ori fleet starts invading neighbouring systems as reinforcements arrived.

My star cluster.

alemagno12 formats the computer...which is actually his laptop, so..nothing happens. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-13T15:22:13Z" title="10/13/2014 03:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 13, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**

I format the mother computer of this forum

--------------------------------------

My hill
no computer fromating alemango

> 
> no computer fromating alemango

![grumpy-cat-says-no.jpg](http://yourdailyweb.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/grumpy-cat-says-no.jpg)

~$ls /dev/metasys

...

...

Current hills confirmed not to be run on any sort of meta-computer. All deletions of hills confirmed to be impossible short of actually accessing the forum server, with an appended request that all lame memes be returned to 2009 where they belong.

I locate a hill on Laythe and inverse-claim it. All of Laythe's landmasses except for that hill are mine.

OOC: A few things here.

You don't format a computer. You reset the server, repair the computer, or recover the system.

Also avoid resetting the scenario too many times or the wrath of BIOS consumes the hill.

Also, when you reset a scenario, you reset it to April 2012 (the date of the creation of the thread).

That's all.

======

I nuke Laythe. My radioactive Laythe.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-15T02:03:21Z" title="10/15/2014 02:03  AM" data-short="9 yr">October 15, 2014</time> by Designer225**

I put sprinkles on Laythe and eat it.

My yucky-tasting salty wet piece of rock.

Your mouth explodes. Laythe can't fit in there!

My debris of Tery's mouth.

You flew all the way out there just to find that? Disgusting.

Laythe spontaneously pops back into existence. I grab a vial of its seawater and wear it around my neck for good luck, and also because it clearly has magical properties.

I also claim a hill on Tylo because hey, why not. My Tylo hill.

The Tylo hill has not yet been claimed by SSME.

I send Chris Kermanfield to land there and actually plant a flag there. Now SSME property.

My Tylo hill.

I pull out a handgun and shoot at the flag. The bullet streaks out ahead of me, gaining most of its Tylo-relative velocity from my already considerable suborbital speed. The bullet impacts the flag's base at over five kilometers per second, blasting a crater in the top of the hill and launching the flag onto a neighboring hill. You can have that one. The crater-topped hill is mine.

\*physics\*

How can a bullet blast a crater in a hill? I snatch your wimpy bullet and replace it with Eeloo, moving at 200 kilometers per second. The power of HyperEdit!

My destroyed Tylo-Eeloo (Tyloo) object.

My fleet of Ori warships continue to expand throughout the galaxy, converting to the Ori religion all intelligent lifeforms. The crusade is halfway finished, and will soon attain Earth, situated on the other side of the galaxy. All these Laythe eating situations are mere internal affairs.

(the ori religion is a thing from the stargate show, so please moderators, don't panic)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-15T08:40:40Z" title="10/15/2014 08:40  AM" data-short="9 yr">October 15, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**
  
typo

ALL ori AND crusade ships explode spontaneously. Using a quicksave and a backup, I successfully reverted the effects. I plant all the flags on all the planets.

my beautiful galaxy!

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-15T10:05:06Z" title="10/15/2014 10:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">October 15, 2014</time> by Joshwoo69**

Since you didn't destroy the Supergate around Eve, more Ori warships arrive and retake almost every single planet back again.

For the record, Ori warships *are* crusade ships. They are 1.5 km long things capable of housing thousands of soldiers to convert or destroy a planet.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-15T11:35:52Z" title="10/15/2014 11:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">October 15, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**
  
typo (again)
the imperium's ships make them tiny ori ships look pathetic. A fleet of them leaves the megaverse on a crusade to enlighten the stupid ori and PUSH THEM BACKTHROUGH THAT SUPERGATE

I fire a bullet at the physics doubters and Ori ships from the magical super-rifle I made that accelerates its 40-gram projectiles to 0.99c shortly after they leave the end of the barrel. At that relativistic speed, the bullet carries almost exactly the energy of one megaton of TNT. It goes straight through fourteen ships before finally lodging in the fifteenth one it hits.

A bullet (40 grams) moving at five kilometers per second impacts with five megajoules of energy, by the way, which is about a megajoule more than a kilogram of TNT. Totally enough to knock down a flag on Tylo and leave a sizable crater in the dust.

I watch the spectacle of ships exploding from my crater-topped hill on Tylo, which is still totally mine.
the imperium navy was left out of your attacks, and BROUGHT GLORIOUS DEATH IN THE NEMAE OF THE EMEPEROR

You still haven't claimed anything, though. For good measure, I fire three more relativistic bullets at key assets in your fleet, resulting in a high-energy ablation cascade which consumes your fleet in a nuclear fireball.

I'm still on my Tylo hill.

I use a modifyed Columbus shuttle with a LV-N as its main engine and send a refueling outpost above Tylo, which also has a Tylonianlander and lands on a Tylonian flat.

My AlienRockFlat.
MOAR SHIPS WHICH CALIM THE GALAXY AND YOUR TYLO HILL BRING MOAR GLORIOUS DEATH IN THE NAME OF THE EMPERAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!! caps

Havent claimed my rock flat yet.

My Tylo Rock Flat.
